summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Housing and Building Maintenance Code enforcement, amending Sections 22.202.050, 22.206.160, 22.206.200, 22.206.220, 22.206.230, 22.206.280, 22.206.290, 22.208.030, 22.208.050, 22.208.150, 22.208.160 adding new Sections 22.206.235, 22.206.315, and repealing Sections 22.206.300, 22.206.310 and Ch. 22.207 of the Seattle Municipal Code.
